data.fullContent: Getting insurance denied does not necessarily mean pay the bill. It means review the bill and follow up if necessary. Many times, you will find that a coding mistake takes care of the issue. Sometimes, you just need to stay on the telephone and keep pushing back. You may need to get your OMS specialist to write a letter to the insurance company to further explain the circumstances.
data.answer: 被拒绝投保并不一定意味着要付账单。这意味着审查账单，并在必要时跟进。很多时候，您会发现一个编码错误解决了这个问题。有时候，你只需要坚持打电话，并不断反击。你可能需要让你的OMS专家给保险公司写一封信，进一步解释情况。
